design_principles.name: Leveza com Subst√¢ncia
design_principles.description: Every interface element should feel light and breathable while communicating real value. Like the dandelion seeds, our designs disperse freely but carry the weight of transformation. Ample whitespace is not emptiness - it's room to breathe.
design_principles.brand_connection: Reflects the core promise of achieving more with less effort. Connects to the 'leveza e mudan√ßa' symbolism of the dandelion.
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Clean, structured layouts | EMOTIONAL: Generous breathing room feels welcoming

do.description: Use generous padding and margins. Let content breathe with neutral-50 backgrounds. Cards float with subtle shadows.
do.example: A testimonial card with 32px internal padding, soft shadow-md, surrounded by 48px of neutral-50 space

dont.description: Pack information tightly. Use heavy borders or cramped layouts that feel suffocating.
dont.example: A dense grid of testimonials with 8px gaps, heavy 2px borders, and aggressive drop shadows

design_principles.name: Provoca√ß√£o Visual
design_principles.description: Design should challenge assumptions before offering solutions, mirroring the brand voice of 'provoque primeiro, acolha depois.' Use visual hierarchy and contrast to create moments of disruption that lead to clarity.
design_principles.brand_connection: Translates the voice dimension 'Respectful ‚Üî Irreverent (3.5/5)' into visual form. Reflects Ju√ßan√£'s approach of 'cutucar com carinho.'
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Strategic placement of disruptive elements | EMOTIONAL: Bold burgundy moments that command attention

do.description: Lead with a provocative visual element (burgundy accent, bold question, asymmetric layout) before revealing the comfortable solution.
do.example: A hero section with burgundy accent bar and bold question 'Voc√™ t√° trabalhando 12h por dia?' followed by calm navy text offering the path forward

dont.example: A hero with 'Bem-vinda ao nosso site' and a generic handshake image

design_principles.name: Transforma√ß√£o Progressiva
design_principles.description: Use the Navy ‚Üí Burgundy ‚Üí Gold gradient metaphor throughout interactions. Users should feel visual movement from strategic foundation (navy) through passionate action (burgundy) to golden freedom. This is not just decoration - it's the brand story in color.
design_principles.brand_connection: Embodies the complete brand journey from the 5 pillars methodology. Represents the transformation from 'pris√£o do fundador' to 'liberdade.'
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Navy entry points and foundations | EMOTIONAL: Burgundy transformation moments | FREEDOM: Gold achievement states

do.description: Apply the gradient metaphor to user journeys. Entry points in navy, engagement moments in burgundy, completion states in gold accents.
do.example: Form progress: Step 1 has navy heading, Step 2 introduces burgundy accents, Completion screen features gold celebration elements

dont.description: Use random color assignments without meaning. Apply the transformation gradient as pure decoration without purpose.
dont.example: Random burgundy buttons mixed with navy buttons with no semantic difference

design_principles.name: Autoridade Acess√≠vel
design_principles.description: Balance professional credibility with approachable warmth. Typography should convey expertise (serif Lora for body) while remaining conversational. Never cold, never flippant. Like 'uma mistura de Bren√© Brown com sua amiga empres√°ria.'
design_principles.brand_connection: Translates the voice dimension 'Formal ‚Üî Casual (4/5)' - professional substance without corporate formality.
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Serif typography conveys expertise | EMOTIONAL: Generous spacing and warm neutrals feel personal

do.description: Use Lora for body text to establish credibility. Pair with Century Gothic for headlines that feel modern yet grounded. Use navy-700/800 for text, not pure black.
do.example: Body text in Lora Regular at 18px, line-height 1.6, color neutral-700, with Century Gothic Bold headings in primary-800

dont.description: Use pure black text (#000000) or clinical sans-serif for body. Create cold, corporate-feeling interfaces.
dont.example: Arial body text in pure black on stark white, tight 1.3 line-height

design_principles.name: Convite, N√£o Press√£o
design_principles.description: All interactive elements should feel like an extended hand, not a sales push. CTAs invite participation rather than demanding action. Reflects the premium positioning - we don't need to pressure because the value speaks.
design_principles.brand_connection: Embodies the red line against 'guru language' and cheap tactics. Premium brands invite; they don't chase.
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Clear, honest value propositions | EMOTIONAL: Warm, personal invitation language

do.description: Use inviting button language ('VAMOS?', 'Quero conhecer', 'Me conta mais'). Provide clear exit paths. Let users explore at their pace.
do.example: Primary CTA: 'VAMOS?' in burgundy-700 | Secondary: 'Ver detalhes primeiro' in navy outline

dont.description: Use pressure tactics (countdown timers, fake scarcity, aggressive pop-ups). Make users feel trapped.
dont.example: '√öLTIMA CHANCE! Compre AGORA antes que acabe!' with flashing countdown timer

design_principles.name: Sementes em Movimento
design_principles.description: Incorporate subtle motion that echoes the dandelion seeds dispersing freely. Movement should feel natural, organic, and effortless - never jarring or attention-seeking. Motion represents possibility and gentle progress.
design_principles.brand_connection: Direct translation of the brand symbol - dente-de-le√£o seeds flying represent freedom, movement, and organic growth.
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Motion with purpose and restraint | EMOTIONAL: Organic, breath-like rhythms that feel alive

do.description: Use gentle fade-ins, soft float animations, and organic easing curves. Elements should feel like they drift into place naturally.
do.example: Cards animate in with 400ms ease-out, slight upward drift (8px), opacity fade from 0 to 1

dont.description: Use aggressive animations, bounces, shakes, or attention-grabbing motion. No spinning, pulsing, or urgent indicators.
dont.example: Buttons that pulse repeatedly, modals that bounce into view, shake animations on form errors

design_principles.name: Espa√ßo para Respirar
design_principles.description: Honor the philosophy of 'leveza' by treating whitespace as a design element, not empty space. Every interface should feel like it has room to breathe, reflecting the promise of less overwhelm and more clarity.
design_principles.brand_connection: Cinza Claro (#ECECEC) represents 'equil√≠brio, leveza e espa√ßo - fundo neutro para que as ideias respirem.'
design_principles.duality_alignment: RATIONAL: Structured, intentional negative space | EMOTIONAL: Relief from the visual overwhelm Carolina experiences daily

do.description: Use 60% neutral backgrounds (neutral-50, accent-50). Apply 48-64px section padding. Let hero sections breathe with 80-120px vertical space.
